Data API¶

GoLismero has 3 types os data:

  • Information structures details
  • Resources structures details
  • Vulnerabilities structures details

Each type of data respresent a particular information.

Common interfaces¶

Cada tipo de información tiene una interfaz común, que hay a continuación:

Information types¶

El formato general de los tipo de información es:

class golismero.api.data.information.Information¶

Base class for informational results.

add_resource(res)¶

Add resource elements associated to an information.

Parameters:res (Resource) – Resource element.
add_vulnerability(vuln)¶

Add vulnerability elements associated to an information.

Parameters:info (Vulnerability) – Vulnerability element.
associated_resources¶

Get a list with resources associated to this information.

Returns:List with resources.
Return type:list
associated_vulnerabilities¶

Get a list with vulnerabilities associated to this information.

Returns:List with vulnerabilities.
Return type:list

Resource types¶

class golismero.api.data.resource.Resource¶

Base class resources.

add_information(info)¶

Add information elements associated to a resource.

Parameters:info (Information) – Information element.
add_vulnerability(vuln)¶

Add vulnerability elements associated to a resource.

Parameters:info (Vulnerability) – Vulnerability element.
associated_informations¶

Get a list with informations associated to this resource.

Returns:List with informations.
Return type:list
associated_informations_by_category(information_type=None)¶

Get accociated information by category.

Parameters:information_type (int) – One of the Information.INFORMATION_* constants.
Returns:set(Data) – Set of associated informations.
Raises ValueError:
 The specified information type is invalid.
associated_vulnerabilities¶

Get a list with vulnerabilities associated to this resource.

Returns:List with vulnerabilities.
Return type:list
associated_vulnerabilities_by_category(cat_name=None)¶

Get accociated vulnerabilites by category.

Parameters:cat_name (str) – category name
Returns:set(Data) – Set of associated informations. Returns an empty set if the category doesn’t exist.

Vulnerability types¶

class golismero.api.data.vulnerability.Vulnerability(impact=0, cve='', cwe='', severity=0, risk=0, references=())¶

Base class for all vulnerabilities reported by the testing plugins.

add_information(info)¶

Add information elements associated to a vulnerability.

Parameters:info (Information) – Information element.
add_resource(res)¶

Add resource elements associated to a vulnerability.

Parameters:res (Resource) – Resource element.
associated_informations¶

Get a list with informations associated to this vulnerability.

Returns:List with informations.
Return type:list
associated_resources¶

Get a list with resources associated to this vulnerability.

Returns:List with resources.
Return type:list
class golismero.api.data.vulnerability.UrlVulnerability(url, impact=0, cve='', cwe='', severity=0, risk=0, references=())¶

Base class for all vulnerabilities associated with a single URL.

content_type¶

str - MIME content type.

has_post_param¶

bool - True if there are POST params, False otherwise.

has_url_param¶

bool - True if there are URL params, False otherwise.

is_https¶

bool – True if it’s HTTPS, False otherwise.

method¶

str – HTTP method.

post_params¶

dict(str) – POST parameters.

referer¶

str – Referer for this URL.

request_type¶

int - One of the HTML.TYPE_* constants.

url¶

str – Raw URL.

url_params¶

dict(str) – URL parameters.
